post.body: Yeah, I got that app and I'll check what my high score is when I get back to the hotel.
Watchin "Tremors 4: The Legend Begins". Love how the start from the beginning and Bert Gummer from the 1st 3 is in it. Well minus the guns.
Jst finished "Tremors 3: Back To Perfection". Good but not as awesome as #2
Wachin "Tremors 3: Back To Perfection" for the first time!!
Leaving Tampa : (
Gettin pumped for the first game of today. Pendulum!!!!!
Lunchin in Tampa http://tinyurl.com/8bj78b
Eatin some pizza down in Tampa
In Tampa, the resort is amazing but they don't have free wifi in the rooms. First game in 2 hours.
Just finished Tremors 2. It was freakin amazing!! Hopefully the next 2 are just as good!
Watchin Tremors 2: Aftershocks for the first time on my new laptop. Just passed South of the Border.
World of Goo is addicting. I'm glad I downloaded the demo before we hit the road. Been on the road for 5 hours, almost @ South of the Border
Leaving for Tampa. Will be there in 14 or 15 hors!
on my new laptop!
Merry Christmas!!
Finished Silent Night! I give it a 91/100. Craig was amazing as the Joker & the story was great but some of the actors were just bad.
Watching EvilIguanaProduction's movie Silent Night for the first time! youtube.com/eviliguanaproduction
JigZone.com is really friggin addicting
Yay!! Finally home! Now I can watch EIP's movie, Silent Night
Ron Jon's didn't have the hat I wanted. Might just have to get it online. Unless there's one in Tampa. (I'm going there in 3 days)
